arts.ttl: £60m Arsenal player actually might not be happy after beating Athletic Club in the Champions League
arts.sum: Arsenal beat Athletic Club in the Champions League on Tuesday evening to get their European campaign off to the perfect start. Indeed, Arsenal won 2-0...

arts.ttl: Forget Martinelli and Trossard, 68-touch star was actually Arsenal’s best player vs Athletic Club
Mikel Arteta earns praise for his substitutions against Bilbao
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta has received praise for his tactical substitutions after Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard came off the bench to secure Arsenal’s 2-0 victory over Bilbao in the Champions League. The Gunners approached the match determined to make a strong impression and earn their first win in the competition this season. arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta sends 'more important' warning to two Arsenal stars after Bilbao win
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta was delighted by the impact from his substitutes Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard after they both scored in the win over Athletic Club

arts.ttl: Arsenal fans have a lot to say about ‘cheat code’ Cristhian Mosquera after Athletic Club performance
Athletic Club 0-2 Arsenal: Martinelli's 36 seconds of brilliance and Trossard’s finish secure the spoils
arts.sum: Arsenal became the first side in European Cup/UEFA Champions League history to claim their sixth consecutive victory over Spanish opposition, as replacements Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard brilliantly scored to put aside Athletic Club in Bilbao. For the hosts, it was their first outing in the Champions League since the 2014-2015 season, with the club managed by Valverde at that time as well.

arts.ttl: Gabriel Jesus reacts to Gabriel Martinelli’s goal for Arsenal against Athletic Club, Mikel Arteta will love it
Athletic Bilbao 0-2 Arsenal ANALYSIS: The key to the Gunners' victory, the star who is close to being fully unleashed - and the player galvanised by absentees
arts.sum: Arsenal's quest for Champions League glory began in perfect fashion with a 2-0 win at Athletic Bilbao. Daily Mail Sport's ISAAN KHAN was at the San Mames Stadium to oversee the win...

arts.ttl: “Very good” Pundit reacts to Arsenal’s win against Athletic Club
arts.sum: Paul Robinson has praised Arsenal for their strong performance in Spain as they secured a 2-0 win over Athletic Club in the Champions League this evening. The result reinforces Arsenal’s status as one of the competition’s favourites and highlights the importance of consistent away form in progressing to the later stages of the tournament. arts.ttl: Arteta lauds Arsenal super-subs after win in Bilbao
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta said Arsenal's "finishers can be more important than the starters" after Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard sealed a Champions League win against Athletic Club.
